title: I am honor 3 already, but still cannot see my honor 3 flair when in loading screen. Why?
body: why ? I can see other people's honor 4 flair

replies.body: Accurate comments below, thanks for the assist!  You can get a flair for the next game by receiving honors in the previous.  It will only last for one game, though!
did you get an honor after you hit honor 3? it only shows up if you got honored, A lot of people missed that when reading about the honor update so I'm just making sure

> [{quoted}](name=Teemo Feeder,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PgfUy8Lx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-02T01:39:04.879+0000)
>
> did you get an honor after you hit honor 3? it only shows up if you got honored, A lot of people missed that when reading about the honor update so I'm just making sure

When you get honored by at least 1 person who you didn't queue with, the next game loading screen shows it. If you don't get honored in that game,  it won't appear again in the next. To add on to what you said.
